sn41.2:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā therā bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍe viharanti ambāṭakavane.
sn41.2:1.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn41.2:1.5: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn41.2:1.6: Atha kho therā bhikkhū tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṃsu.
sn41.2:2.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:2.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn41.2:2.4: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.2:2.5: Dutiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:2.7: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn41.2:2.8: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.2:2.9: Tatiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:2.11: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn41.2:2.12: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.2:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā isidatto tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.2:3.2: Atha kho āyasmā isidatto āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:3.3: “byākaromahaṃ, bhante thera, cittassa gahapatino etaṃ pañhan”ti?
sn41.2:3.4: “Byākarohi tvaṃ, āvuso isidatta, cittassa gahapatino etaṃ pañhan”ti.
sn41.2:3.7: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ, vuttaṃ bhagavatā’”ti?
sn41.2:3.12: Ettāvatā kho, gahapati, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti.
sn41.2:4.1: Atha kho citto gahapati āyasmato isidattassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā there bhikkhū paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
sn41.2:4.2: Atha kho therā bhikkhū bhuttāvino onītapattapāṇino uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn41.2:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā thero āyasmantaṃ isidattaṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:4.4: “sādhu kho taṃ, āvuso isidatta, eso pañho paṭibhāsi, neso pañho maṃ paṭibhāsi.
sn41.2:4.5: Tenahāvuso isidatta, yadā aññathāpi evarūpo pañho āgaccheyya, taññevettha paṭibhāseyyā”ti.
